title: South Africa overpower hosts Japan to end the best storyline in world rugby
text:
All good things must come to end and Japan’s magnificent run to the quarter-finals, the best advertisement that rugby has received since Jonah Lomu lit up the 1995 World Cup, was crushed under the weight of the Springboks’ brute force.

So it is South Africa who will face Wales in the semi-finals as the power of the set piece triumphed over the pace and precision of Japan’s free-wheeling attack. Even if it was a thoroughly deserved victory, it was a downbeat ending to Japan’s first foray into the World Cup knockout stages. They were the most majestic of hosts, playing with a flair and creativity that few sides have mustered and providing hospitality in the most telling of circumstances.

Just...
description: All good things must come to end and Japan’s magnificent run to the quarter-finals, the best advertisement that rugby has received since Jonah Lomu lit up the 1995 World Cup, was crushed under the weight of the Springboks’ brute force.
